name: King Froggo
description:
A Frog named Frogo was a terrible king who did not know moderation, he would bring havoc to his kingdom at once, and in the next he would immerse them in the excess of everything.

One day someone throws a curse on him - a frog must learn to moderate to eat as much as he needs, no more and only then he will regain his kingdom.

The bigger you get,
the higher you jump.
The smaller you get,
the better you fit.

If you get too small,
you will disappear.

Find your way up!

Controls:
Use arrows to move
Press space to jump
Press arrow down 
to get smaller

Catch worms 
and eat apples
to get bigger

Credits:

Credits:
Font - Goudy Mediaeval Regular by Dieter Steffmann
Music - Tavern - World of Warcraft
Music - The Fox And The Farmer by Justin Bell
